title: Law Class of 1992 Bridget Klauber Endowed Public Service Fellowship Fund
description: To provide stipends to students enrolled in the Law School at the University of Colorado who are working in unpaid or low-paid positions with a state public defender or other indigent criminal defense provider.
marketingContent: To provide stipends to students enrolled in the Law School at the University of Colorado who are working in unpaid or low-paid positions with a state public defender or other indigent criminal defense provider.
